name: Ball'n'Box
description:
Ball'n'Box - it's a game, where you need to dodge the boxes, while are you alive on map will spawn some powerups, which you can pickup!

HowTo Play:

Use your mouse to set direction in which your ball will fly (it's inverted, you know), click to make him fly (also sorry for my english, that bad)

Game made by Arseniy Semenov

Main music: David Renda - 8 Bit Surf (www.FesliyanStudios.com)
